comment: Smart Data Models - Pss5 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/Pss5/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian PSS - Detailed PSS.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: ctw2
contents.comment: Selector for Second washout enabling (C). true = second washout filter is bypassed false = second washout filter in use. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: deadband
contents.comment: Stabilizer output dead band (DeadBand).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: isfreq
contents.comment: Selector for Frequency/shaft speed input (IsFreq). true = speed false = frequency. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Frequency/shaft speed input gain (K).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpe
contents.comment: Electric power input gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpss
contents.comment: PSS gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pmm
contents.comment: Minimum power PSS enabling (P).  Typical Value = 0.25. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tl1
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tl2
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tl3
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tl4
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tpe
contents.comment: Electric power filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: tw1
contents.comment: First WashOut (T).  Typical Value = 3.5. Default: 0

contents.name: tw2
contents.comment: Second WashOut (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: vadat
contents.comment: Default: False

contents.name: vsmn
contents.comment: Stabilizer output max limit (V).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsmx
contents.comment: Stabilizer output min limit (V).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
